description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1c2er","text":"This protocol is used  for construction and sequencing of DNA libraries which include short-insert libraries and mate-paired libraries on the Hiseq 2000 platform for the eastern banjo frog. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: ,DNA seq,paired-end sequencing,Hiseq 2000,the eastern banjo frog,Library construction

parent_collections.title: Protocols for the draft genome assembly of the eastern banjo frog Limnodynastes dumerilii dumerilii
Protocols for the draft genome assembly of the eastern banjo frog Limnodynastes dumerilii dumerilii

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"11udg","text":"The following step is the protocol for construction and sequencing of short-insert libraries (170 bp, 250 bp, 500 bp, and 800 bp).","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":130}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7n69e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8p7hc","text":"The following step is the protocol for construction and sequencing of mate-paired libraries (2 kb, 5 kb, 10 kb, and 20 kb).","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":123}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47tig","text":"The extracted 1 µg genomic DNA was randomly fragmented by Covaris E220 ultrasonicator (Covaris, Brighton, UK) to obtain ~170 bp, ~250 bp, ~500 bp, and ~800 bp fragments (for 170 bp, 250 bp, 500 bp, and 800 bp libraries respectively).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"131pm","text":"Repair by using T4 DNA polymerase (ENZYMATICS, Beverly, the U.S.) 30 min. at 20 ℃ to obtain blunt ends which were then 3’-adenlyated to create sticky ends.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cktcr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"civuq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3esbr","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"927ub","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":127976,"mol_weight":0,"name":"T4 DNA polymerase","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"AE3D7B8059E111EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":282,"name":"Enzymatics","link":"http://www.enzymatics.com/","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"B0EE91C059E111EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"BA0BA36059E111EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bucd8","text":"T-tailed adapters were ligated to both ends of these DNA fragments and amplified.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aepg9","text":"After purification, the library was qualified by the Agilent Technologies 2100 bioanalyzer and ABI StepOnePlus Realtime PCR System.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fdgol","text":"Finally, the qualified libraries were sequenced paired-end using Hiseq System (Illumina).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b0kom","text":"The genomic DNA was fragmented using a Covaris E220 ultrasonicator (Covaris, Brighton, UK) to obtain ~2 kb (for 2 kb library) and a Hydroshear (GeneMachines, CA, USA) to obtain ~5 kb, ~10 kb, ~20 kb fragments (for 5 kb, 10 kb, and 20 kb libraries respectively).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6ic2e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"enog","text":"Repair by using T4 DNA polymerase (ENZYMATIC, Beverly, the U.S.) 30 min at 20 ℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6916p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dvltr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"36s45","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9j391","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"6gvuj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"CDE6D0A059DA11EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D469885059DA11EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"acl7m","text":"Add Biotin Label by Biotin dNTP Mix (5mM) 30 min at 20 ℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1if2a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"sp2s","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7rg6r","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fmr5a","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4egv1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":127977,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Biotin dNTP Mix","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"0DF659E059DB11EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":191,"name":"Invitrogen - Thermo Fisher","link":"http://www.thermofisher.com/us/en/home/brands/invitrogen.html","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"107C8F9059DB11EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"16C60ED059DB11EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5f2ig","text":"These fragments were further selected into size ranges of 2–2.4 kb, 5–5.5 kb, 10–11 kb or 20-23 kb by agarose gel electrophoresis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87bsj","text":"The T3 DNA ligase was used to connect the ring. And then, Covaris LE220 was used to cyclize DNA fragments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2ga22","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"275qg","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"euj4i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":127978,"mol_weight":0,"name":"T3 DNA ligase","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"9971236059DB11EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":282,"name":"Enzymatics","link":"http://www.enzymatics.com/","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brjod","text":"Fragmented DNA labeled with biotin was captured on M280 streptavidin beads (Invitrogen, CA, USA), followed by end repair (30 min. at 20°C, 1000 rotation per minute, rpm, vibrate for 15 sec. per 2 min.), A-tailing (30 min. at 37°C, 1000 rpm vibrate for 15 sec. per 2 min.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b8h4r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cpt9n","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bipl6","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fnha9","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"6rm1e","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7bcnr","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"30h1j","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"12vdh","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4a8ea","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":127979,"mol_weight":0,"name":"M280 streptavidin beads","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"C01C953059DB11EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":191,"name":"Invitrogen - {"blocks":[{"key":"bedi6","text":"Adaptor ligation (1h at 20 °C, 1000rmp vibrate for 15 sec per 2 min.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"at4pd","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"enq7n","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"dq9n8","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4j9jg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"F600AA1059DB11EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F9DF6AE059DB11EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"20","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":15,"guid":"FDA8CEF059DB11EA8EB2B9FC35B82097","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

title: Construction and sequencing of DNA libraries on Hiseq 2000 platform for the eastern banjo frog
title_html: Construction and sequencing of DNA libraries on Hiseq 2000 platform for the eastern banjo frog
